Plot: The Rizzos, a family who doesn't share their habits, aspirations, and careers with one another, find their delicate web of lies disturbed by the arrival of a young ex-con (Strait) brought ...
Title: City Island
Actors: Andy Garcia, Julianna Margulies, Steven Strait, Emily Mortimer
tomatoConsensus: Raymond De Felitta combines warmth, humanity, and a natural sense of humor, and is abetted by Andy Garcia and an excellent ensemble cast.
